
```{r}
HS.model <- ' visual  =~ x1 + x2 + x3
              textual =~ x4 + x5 + x6
              speed   =~ x7 + x8 + x9 '
HS.model
```

```{r}
fit <- sem(HS.model, 
           data = HolzingerSwineford1939)
fit
```

```{r}

        standardized=TRUE)
```
